places_to_visit.name: Patong Beach
places_to_visit.description: Patong Beach is the most famous beach in Phuket, known for its vibrant nightlife, shopping, and water sports. It’s ideal for those looking for both relaxation and excitement.

places_to_visit.name: Phi Phi Islands
places_to_visit.description: The Phi Phi Islands are a group of stunning islands known for their crystal-clear waters, dramatic cliffs, and vibrant marine life. They’re perfect for snorkeling, diving, and island-hopping.

places_to_visit.name: Big Buddha
places_to_visit.description: The Big Buddha is a massive statue located on Nakkerd Hill. It offers panoramic views of Phuket and is a significant cultural and spiritual site.

places_to_visit.name: Old Phuket Town
places_to_visit.description: Old Phuket Town is known for its well-preserved Sino-Portuguese architecture, colorful buildings, and lively markets. It’s a great place to explore local history and culture.

places_to_visit.name: Phang Nga Bay
places_to_visit.description: Phang Nga Bay is famous for its stunning limestone cliffs and emerald-green waters. It's ideal for boat tours, kayaking, and exploring the famous James Bond Island.
